description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nFlubris's Entrapment:
When an enemy takes damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON} or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}, they have a 50% chance to be afflicted with a random debuff. This trait does not stack.
name: Flubris's Third Arm
